<Auto Player>Then we have to leave now.\. We have to go

Decker from...\. From whatever this is. It's a miracle
that you made it through town with those...\. Terminators
<Auto Event: 1>DECKER! Get your butt back in the bunker \.NOW!
<Auto Event: 4>Fiiiiine, Mom.\. Ugh.\. Freakin' ROBOT APOCALYPSE and
you STILL somehow manage to suck all the fun out of it.
<Auto Event: 1>You give them everything, and they just...
<Auto Event: 1>I'm flying blind here, Melody. I don't know what
the hell's going on,\. but I have to keep Decker safe.\!
You can stay here.\. Ride this out.\.
Or you can leave with a Med Kit.\. Your choice.
<Auto Player>Harmony will die if I stay.\!
And I can't save her without you.

<Auto Event: 1>And it got him killed, Decker!\.
<Auto Event: 1>So, Melody, what will it be?
::This page is just for dialogue options::
Don't you want to know what we're up against?
You could be a hero to everyone.
<Auto Player>Cassie, I'm begging you to help me.
<Auto Event: 1>You can't save everyone. I spent years preparing
for society to collapse. I always knew there'd be
It's the right thing to do.
You're the only one who can help.
<Auto Player>You can't mean that. We all need to stick
<Auto Event: 1>You mean those people who shut me down when
I warned them that we needed to prepare for the
worst? No thanks. \|I always liked you, Melody,
which is why I'll get you a Med Kit. Good luck!
It's the right thing to do.
<Auto Player>You're wrong. You can help save people.
It's the right thing to do.
<Auto Event: 1>My husband did the right thing. It got him
killed. You want me to do that to my son?
Make him an orphan? \.You can take the Med
Kit, but I'm locking the door behind you.
You're the only one who can help.
<Auto Player>But you're the only one who can help me.
<Auto Event: 1>You have yourself. That's all I've ever had
since Decker's dad died and left me alone. \.
You're on your own, Melody. Grab the Med Kit
and do what you can to save Harmony.
Don't you want to know what we're up against?
<Auto Player>You said you're flying blind. You need intel
to survive. The answers are out there. Not here.
<Auto Event: 1>I saw one of those things kamikaze my
You need to see them up close to understand.
I saw something... before the explosion (lie).
You need to see them up close to understand.
<Auto Player>Yeah, but it's different when you're up close
and look into their glowing red eyes.
<Auto Event: 1>You're crazier than I thought. I spent years
prepping so I wouldn't need to fight eye-to-eye
to survive. \.Go ahead. Take a Med Kit. Tempt
Harmony said something about these being her
research robots. She might know what's really
going on and how to stop it.
Her bots? It's not much to go on, but...\.
if she could tell us how to stop this now...\.
Ugh. Fine. \.Grab the Med Kit. You better not
I saw something... before the explosion (lie).
<Auto Player>Before the explosion I saw something. A light.
It was blinding. Coming from outside of town. I
think it was the source of all this chaos.
<Auto Event: 1>That could be anything. Or... it could be more
trouble coming our way. Would the bunker hold
out? \.Dammit! I'll have to see for myself.\.
You could be a hero to everyone.
<Auto Player>Everyone in Stamets Point knows you're strong
and could survive anything. If you help us,
you go from the town's survivor to its savior.
<Auto Event: 1>Save it. I'm not much for heroics. In the end
it doesn't matter if you die a hero. You're
<Auto Player>Is that what you want to teach Decker? Cower
<Auto Event: 1>Yes! Decker is just a kid. He'll come to
understand.\. If he ever forgives me.\. Maybe
he's right. You can't turn your back on everyone.\.
<Auto Event: 1>Grab the Med Kit and let's go
<Auto Player>How can you be so selfish?! You have all this
training and stockpiles of food and medicine -\.
and you're just going to sit on it and do nothing?
<Auto Event: 1>It's called surviving. It's not pretty. In fact,
it's ugly. But it's what I have to do to
protect Decker. You need to protect Harmony.\.
Now take a Med Kit and go.
<Auto Player>Your husband didn't think that way. What would he
think of you dishonoring his memory by cowering
at home while others are in danger?
<Auto Event: 1>Tread lightly, girl. You're talking about my
family. Go down that road, I'll drop you myself.\.
Now take the Med Kit and get out of my house.\.
<Auto Player>Decker's right, ya know. Helping others is the
right thing to do. He would be so proud of you.
<Auto Event: 1>He's a kid. He's 13 and feels invincible.
He knows it's important to save Harmony (lie).
He understands the risk. He lost his dad, didn't he?
He'll think you're a monster if you don't.
He knows it's important to save Harmony (lie).
<Auto Player>Decker always really liked Harmony. He ran into her
all the time in the forest while she was researching
mushrooms. He'd never forgive you if you let her die.
<Auto Event: 1>Forest? Don't lie to me about my own son. I
can barely get Decker away from his games long
enough to play in the yard. \.Last chance. Take
a med kit and go. You're not welcome here.
He understands the risk. He lost his dad, didn't he?
<Auto Player>I think he understands the risk just fine. He
lost his dad and still wants you to do
what's right despite the risk.\. Don't you want
<Auto Event: 1>Of course I do! I'd do anything for him. I've
done everything for him. I...\. Shit. He's
right. We can't just leave people to die.\.
Grab the Med Kit. I'm coming with you.
He'll think you're a monster if you don't.
<Auto Player>Only a monster would leave someone to die when
they could help.\. That's how he'll see you forever
if you sit here and do nothing.
A monster?! Is that how you see me? I've
sacrificed it all for that kid.\. His dad died, and
did I collapse?\. I fought harder.\. Monster? I'm his
<Auto Event: 1>I'll show you, Mel. Grab a Med Kit
and let's go save your girlfriend.
<Auto Player>Are you serious?\. You're not gonna help me?
<Auto Event: 1>I'm giving you a Med Kit,\. and being generous
at that. I don't owe you anything.
<Auto Event: 1>Med Kit's in the kitchen cabinet.
<Auto Event: 1>Yeah, okay. Let's get moving. The Med Kit's
in the kitchen cabinet. I'll make sure Decker's
safe in the bunker before we leave.
<Auto Player>I'd better head home to help Harmony.
<Auto Player>I better grab that \c[3]Med Kit\c[0] like Cassie said.
<Auto Player>I didn't come all this way to leave without
<Auto Player>I'd better head home to help Harmony.
